Description: Using Combat Mods? Toggle them here

Description: Choose the scene of Giganto's defeat.

Description: Choose the scene of the final Wyvern QTE

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Test.

Elements.Name: BossZevRifleSp00
Description: Choose how you want the Grand Slam to play out.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir3
Description: Choose between 3 batches of QTE Scenes for Supreme.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir4
Description: Supreme uses his wings to fire an even bigger laser. Comes in 2 flavors, one of them pays homage to a certain other game.

Elements.Name: RifleShieldFix
Description: Toggle this option to disable Supreme's Shield Tackle to prevent a crash when parrying the arms.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir5
Description: This mod modifies file: 'bo6xxx.pac' to restore the Monologue. Adds the default 'bgm_boss05' in the files to avoid confliction with other mods that restore the monologue using this file. Place THIS mod above the other mods that implimented the monologue that way. If you don't want to have the monologue heard through the game's cutscenes, you can keep this mod disabled.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir6
Description: Added support for Hyper Sonic skins

Elements.Name: IncludeDir7
Description: The Final QTE has small changes.
Vanilla
Lowered HP for certain combat mods that change Sonic's combat style.
As is in the game.
A recreated version of the beta animation using Giganto's 'Damage_Finish' animation.
A combination of both animations.
Original Audio from release.
Edited Sounds
As is in the game.
Utilizes an unused version left in the game files, with some changes.
The first iteration.
For those that wanted a Secret Rings callback.
The original unused scenes restored and Bitlaser is now a QTE.
Unique scenes utilizing unused animation files for new sequences.
Supreme uses the large diamond turrets more often here. Bitlaser01 and 02 have their extended uncut animations.
Reuses the in-engine Grand Slam coding.

**Experimental** Restores the unused cutscene for Supreme's Grand Slam. Known Issues- 1: Does not inflict damage. 2: Has a softlock problem when using the pause menu to exit to the title screen while fighting as Super Sonic in Ouranos Island.
If you're not having this issue, leave this off.
Use only when your game crashes when trying to parry Supreme's arms when stopping him from tackling Sage and Friend's barrier.
The original animation from the release of the DLC.
Same as the 'Edited' option but with Hyper Sonic's blue outline.
Cuts out the segment of Supreme demon crawling to Sonic.
Same as the 'Edited' option but with Hyper Sonic's blue outline.
The original animation from the release of the DLC. Fixes Super Sonic 2's aura missing and Super Sonic 2 disappearing when escaping Supreme's grip.
The original animation from the release of the DLC. Fixes Super Sonic 2's aura missing and Super Sonic 2 disappearing when escaping Supreme's grip.

When failing the initial QTE prompt and Supreme lands down to grab at Sonic, there's a small difference. When Sonic escapes Supreme's grip, he will spindash and kick him in the back of the head. When failing, Supreme chucks Sonic instead of slamming him to the floor.

When failing the initial QTE prompt and Supreme lands down to grab at Sonic, there's a small difference. When Sonic escapes Supreme's grip, he will spindash and kick him in the back of the head. When failing, Supreme chucks Sonic instead of slamming him to the floor.
The Fake Moon just floats there, menacingly.
The moon remains high in the sky puppeterring Supreme in silent. SS2's transformation has a slight camera change.
Original animation but for character skins using Hyper forms over SS2. Blue Aura only.
Same as SS2 Edited, but with different effects to fit Hyper Sonic's transformation.
The End will praddle on and start boasting in certain cutscenes. It will also flex its high kill count.
The End will start its blog yap session on how powerful it is and how Sonic is weak and meaningless. SS2's transformation has a slight camera change and a little extra effects.
Original animation but for character skins using Hyper forms over SS2. Blue Aura only. The End will start yapping.
Same as SS2 Edited, but with different effects to fit Hyper Sonic's transformation.
